thread.title: Norman Yahraus
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Norman Yahraus

author: Norman Yahraus
title: Norman Yahraus
text: The customer service rep was very knowledgeable about my previous purchase from 10 years ago! He know exactly what was needed to update my system without trying to sell me something new. I received the products I ordered within 3-4 days.
